channel.title: Central Oregon Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Central Oregon Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 North at US-20 - Riley
item.description: US-395 North at US-20 in Riley. Use US-20 West to Bend and Portland; use US-395 North/US-20 East to Burns and John Day. US-395 North joins US-20 East to Burns.

item.title: Greenwood Ave. East at NE 3rd St
item.description: Greenwood Ave. East at NE 3rd St (Bus. US-97/US-20) in Bend. Continue straight on Greenwood Ave. for US-20 East.

item.title: OR-201 North at US-20/US-26
item.description: OR-201 North at US-20/US-26 in Nyssa. Turn left to continue north on OR-201. OR-201 North joins US-20/US-26 West to Cairo Jct.

item.title: OR-201 North at US-20/US-26 - Nyssa.
item.description: OR-201 North at US-20/US-26 in Nyssa. Turn left for US-20/US-26 West/OR-201 north to Ontario and Vale; turn right for US-20/US-26 East to Parma (Idaho) and Boise (Idaho).

item.title: OR-201 North Approaching US-20/US-26
item.description: OR-201 North approaching US-20/US-26 in Nyssa.

item.title: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395
item.description: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395 in Burns. Turn right for US-20 East/US-395 North; continue straight for US-20 West/US-395 South.

item.title: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395
item.description: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395 in Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395
item.description: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395 in Burns. Turn right for US-20 East/US-395 North to John Day (via US-395) and Vale (via US-20). Continue straight for US-20 West/US-395 South to Lakeview (via US-395) and Bend (via US-20).

item.title: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395
item.description: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395 in Burns.

item.title: US-20 West - Drinkwater Pass
item.description: Drinkwater Pass - Elevation 4212 Feet on US-20 West.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching US-26 West - Vale
item.description: US-20 east approaching US-26 in downtown Vale. The US-26 shield here has been incorrectly signed using the Oregon state highway shield. So it appears to be a US-20/OR-26 junction.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching US-20
item.description: US-26 east approaching US-20 junction in Vale.

item.title: US-20 East - Malheur County/Mountain Time Zone
item.description: Entering Malheur County and Mountain Time Zone on US-20 East. The northern portion of Malheur County is the only area in Oregon that follows Mountain Time. From my travels in Oregon, this is the only blue time zone sign in the state. The rest are the standard green color.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North at OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 north at OR-78 in Burns.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North approaching OR-78. Turn left for US-20 East/US-395 North to John Day (via US-395) and Value (via US-20). Continue straight for OR-78 East to Crane and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North - Hines Logging Road
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North -at CR-127 Jct (Hines Logging Road). Use CR-127 for FR-47, Yellowjacket Lake, and Delintment Lake in the Malheur National Forest.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 west at OR-201 in Nyssa. Turn left for OR-201 south; OR-201 north US-20/US-26 west to Cairo Jct. outside of Ontario.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West - Nyssa
item.description: US-20/US-26 West in Nyssa. This is the first US-20/US-26 shields westbound in Oregon. In the last few years, standard Speed Limit signs have been appearing in Oregon. Normally, Oregon Speed Limit signs omit the word limit, and have larger numbers.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East - Nyssa
item.description: US-20/US-26 East in Nyssa.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East/OR-201 South - Entering Nyssa
item.description: Entering Nyssa on US-20/US-26 East/OR-201 South. Nyssa is located on the Oregon-Idaho border along the Snake River.

item.title: US-20 East - Malheur River
item.description: Malheur River bridge on US-20 east in Malheur County.

item.title: US-20 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-20 east to Vale, Ontario, and Nyssa. Missing US-20 shield on sign.

item.title: US-20 East - Harper Junction
item.description: US-20 east approaching Harper Junction.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at OR-201. Use OR-201 South/US-20 East/US-26 East to Nyssa and Caldwell (ID). Use OR-201 North for Ontario and I-84.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at OR-201. Turn right on OR-201 South/US-20/US-26 East for Adrian and Jordan Valley.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at OR-201. Use OR-201 South/US-20 East/US-26 East to Nyssa and Caldwell (ID). Use OR-201 North for Ontario and I-84.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East in Vale
item.description: US-20/US-26 east in Vale.

item.title: US-20 East at US-26 West
item.description: US-20 east at US-26 in downtown Vale. Use US-26 west for Unity and John Day. Use Glenn St. south for Adrian and Lake Owyhee. US-20 and US-26 join eastwards into Idaho.

item.title: US-20 East Approacing US-26 West
item.description: US-20 east approaching US-26 in downtown Vale. Use US-26 west for Unity and John Day. US-20 and US-26 join eastwards into Idaho.

item.title: US-20 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-20 east to Vale, Ontario, and Nyssa. Missing US-20 shield on sign.

item.title: US-20 East - Little Valley
item.description: Entering the community of Little Valley on US-20 east.

item.title: US-20 East - Next Gas 68 Miles
item.description: Next Gas 68 Miles on US-20 east. Taken just outside of the settlement of Buchanan. The next gas is in the town of Vale.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching US-395
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North approaching US-395 north to John Day and Pendleton.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-20 East/US-395 north to John Day and Vale.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North approaching OR-78. Stay in the left lane for US-20 East/US-395 North for John Day and Vale.

item.title: US-20 West at US-395 South
item.description: US-20 east at US-395. US-395 joins US-20 east through Burns.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching US-395
item.description: US-20 east approaching US-395. Use US-395 south for Wagontire, Valley Falls, and Lakeview.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching US-395
item.description: US-20 east approaching US-395

item.title: US-20 East - Entering Harney County
item.description: Entering Harney County on US-20 east at the Lake-Harney County Line.

item.title: US-20 East - Entering Lake County
item.description: Entering Lake County on US-20 east at the Deschutes-Lake County Line.

item.title: US-20 East - Brothers
item.description: Distance marker on US-20 east outside of Brothers. Distance to Hampton, Vale, and Nyssa.

item.title: US-20 East - Brothers
item.description: US-20 East - Brothers: Elevation 4,640 Feet.

item.title: US-20 East at Camp Creek Road
item.description: US-20 East at Camp Creek Road to Camp Creek, Pringle Flats, and Dry Lake.

item.title: US-20 - Brothers
item.description: Entering the community of Brothers on US-20 east.

item.title: US-20 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-20 east to Brothers and Burns.

item.title: US-20 East at OR-27 North
item.description: US-20 east at OR-27 north to Prineville Reservoir.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching OR-27
item.description: US-20 east approaching OR-27 north.

item.title: US-20 East at George Millican Road
item.description: US-20 East at George Millican Road north to Prineville.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching George Millican Road
item.description: US-20 east approaching George Millican Road, north to Prineville.

item.title: US-20 East at Dickerson Wells Jct.
item.description: US-20 east at Newt Morris Road south to Dickerson Wells, Fox Butte, and Sand Springs.

item.title: US-20 East/Business US-97 South At US-20
item.description: US-20 West/Business US-97 South approaching US-20 East towards Burns (Greenwood Ave.) Use Greenwood Ave. west for Downtown Bend and College.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 147
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 147, OR-74/Ione/Heppner.

item.title: US-20 East at US-395 North
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North at US-395 North to John Day and Pendleton.

item.title: US-20 East at US-395 North
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North at US-395 North to John Day and Pendleton, and US-20 East to Vale and Ontario.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North - Riley
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North - Distance Marker. Distance to Burns, John Day, and Ontario.

item.title: US-20 West at US-395 South
item.description: US-20 east at US-395 south to Valley Falls, Lakeview, and Reno.

item.title: US-20 West at US-395 South
item.description: US-20 East at US-395 South. US-395 North follows US-20 east into Burns.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East - Oregon Thanks You
item.description: Oregon Thanks You. Come Back Soon. Entering Canyon County (Idaho) on US-20/US-26 east at the Oregon/Idaho line.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East Approaching OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 east approaching OR-201 to Nyssa and Ontario, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at OR-201 junction. OR-201 follows US-20/US-26 south to Nyssa.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at OR-201 north To I-84 and Ontario.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at OR-201 north To I-84/Ontario and south to Nyssa, Adrian, and Jordan Valley.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201 South
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at OR-201 junction in Nyssa.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East in Vale
item.description: US-20/US-26 east at eastern end of Vale one-way couplet. Turn left here to return to Vale on US-20/US-26 west.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching US-20
item.description: US-26 east approaching US-20 junction.

item.title: US-26 East at US-20 East
item.description: US-20/US-26 left turn in Vale.

item.title: US-26 East at US-20 West
item.description: US-26 east at US-20 west. US-20 east follows US-26 east from here to Mountain Home, Idaho.

item.title: OR-201 North at US-20/US-26
item.description: Jct. US-20/US-26 west on US-20/US-26/OR-201

item.title: OR-201 North at US-20/US-26
item.description: US-20/US-26 west to Burns and Bend, on US-20/US-26/OR-201

item.title: OR-201 North at US-20/US-26
item.description: Approaching US-20/US-26 west to Burns and Bend on US-20/US-26/OR-201

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North at OR-78
item.description: US-20/US-395 north at OR-78 junctio

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North at OR-78
item.description: US-20/US-395 north at OR-78 to Crane and Winnemucca

item.title: US-20 West at US-395 Jct.
item.description: US-20/US-395 north junction to John Day and Pendleton on US-20 west

item.title: US-20 West at US-395 Jct.
item.description: Eben Ray Rd/Black Rock Rd Jct. on US-20 west at US-395 north jct

item.title: US-20 East Approaching US-395 North
item.description: US-20 east approaching US-395 junction in Burns.

item.title: US-20/US-395 - Sage Hen Rest Area
item.description: Distance to Burns and Bend at the exit to the Sage Hen Summit Rest Area on US-395/US-20.

item.title: US-395 North at US-20
item.description: US-20 to Burns, and Bend on US-395 north in Riley.

item.title: US-395 North at US-20
item.description: Junction US-20 on US-395 north, in Riley.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East at OR-201 South
item.description: US-20/US-26 East/OR-201 South at US-20/US-26/OR-201 split. Merge right for OR-201 south to Adrian and Lake Owyhee. Merge left for US-20/US-26 East to Nampa (ID) and Boise (ID).

item.title: Historic Oregon US-20/US-26 Shields
item.description: Historic Oregon US-20/US-26 shields in downtown Nyssa. This photo was taken in 2001, and were replaced with newer shields sometime in the early 2000’s.
